name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Security Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in Cloud Security and Security Architecture while effectively leveraging my expertise in IaaS and PaaS solutions. My proficiency in Threat Modeling, Risk Assessment, and implementing Security Standards ensures compliance with regulations such as FedRAMP and PCI-DSS. I have a solid background in Access Management including OAuth and Cloud SSO, Identity Provisioning, and Identity Governance. My hands-on experience with encryption techniques and key management contributes to developing robust security protocols.
In addition to my security-focused skills, I have a background in full-stack development, utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I am proficient in building high-performance applications using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, alongside deep cloud experience in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML for predictive analytics, and I have a strong foundation in CI/CD automation, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems. My analytical and communication skills empower me to work collaboratively in dynamic environments, while ensuring the highest levels of security are maintained.
